column4: hi all - buying a video/mp3 player and ubuntu forums and google seem to tell me that ipod video would be the best choice - does anyone have any other experience?
consider a Rockbox-compatible player if you are at all interested in firmware hacks.
also consider OQO 1 (could be overkill of course :) )
one thing to be wary of is players that require Windows XP. Make sure that whatever you buy supports the USB mass storage protocol.
